definitions.definition: A fundamental principle or skill , especially in a field of learning .
examples: We'll be learning the rudiments of thermodynamics next week.

definitions.definition: A form that lacks full or complex development .
examples: I have the rudiments of an escape plan.

definitions.definition: A body part that no longer has a function
In percussion , one of a selection of basic drum patterns learned as an exercise .

main_definition: ( often in the plural ) A fundamental principle or skill , especially in a field of learning .
secondary_definitions: ( often in the plural ) A form that lacks full or complex development .
( biology ) A body part that no longer has a function
( music ) In percussion , one of a selection of basic drum patterns learned as an exercise .
